DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to compare the effects of prebiotics versus placebo on blood concentrations of glucagon-like peptide-1 in subjects with diabetes type 2.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Prebiotics on GLP-1 in Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: diabetes type 2 BMI 18,5 40 Not medicated with insulin, GLP1 analogues or DPP4 inhibitors Moderate intake of alcohol Not excessive exercise Less than 3 kg weight change the last two months Intake of less than 30 g dietary fiber per day IBD IBS Coeliac disease Have used antibiotics within the last two months Have used supplements with prebiotics or probiotics the last two months Pregnancy
